mapper.select: SELECT question.id, question.content, question.title, question.datetime, question.up, question.down FROM question WHERE title like #{keyword} or content like #{keyword} ORDER BY question.datetime ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{maxNumInOnePage};

SELECT question.id, question.content, question.title, question.datetime, question.up, question.down FROM question WHERE question.id in (select question_label.question_id from question_label where question_label.label_id = #{label_id}) ORDER BY question.datetime ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{maxNumInOnePage};

SELECT question.id, question.content, question.title, question.datetime, question.up, question.down FROM question WHERE question.author_id = #{author_id} ORDER BY question.datetime ASC LIMIT #{offset},{maxNumInOnePage};
SELECT question.id, question.content, question.title, question.datetime, question.up, question.down, FROM question where question.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into question(author_id, title, content) values(#{author_id}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.update: insert into question_up_down( user_id, question_id, is_up ) values ( #{user_id}, #{question_id}, #{up_down} )
mapper.insert: insert into question_report(user_id, question_id, report_reason_id, remarks) values(#{user_id}, #{question_id}, #{report_reason_id}, #{remarks});
